name: Funky Racing - Accessible Game - Simple Control System
name_original: Funky Racing - Accessible Game - Simple Control System
description:
This game is based around an 1980's BBC racing game. This game turned out better than I was expecting, and I'm quite proud of the number of control options that this game offers - a choice of one and two button control methods. The aim of this game is to make it to the end of level, which is achieved by dodging the other cars and collecting fuel.

Welcome to my corner of the internet.

On my site I create games that can be played with a single input device, allowing my games to accessible to everyone.

All games can be played using just the left-mouse-button; no mouse movement required.

I have set up games to play with just the left mouse button, or any other input device directly or via a switch unit that can 'register' a left mouse click.

For info on my games, please visit: www.EasyToPlayGames.com
